column4: i just booted into ubuntu for the first time after installing it from the alt cd, and the screen is all a dark blue, with a dashed white line going diagonally across the screen, anyone know how this can be fixed
my immediate reaction to that would be to check the monitor cord connection, but if thats fine, try doing sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and falling back to vesa
the cords etc are all fine. how would i do that, i cant get to a command prompt
